Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Windows 7

name: yad2xx
short_description:
This project contains a Java Native Interface library suitable for communicating with a range of USB interface chips from FTDI via the FTDI supplied D2XX USB driver using the Java programming language.

It is a minimal implementation that supports OS X 10.10.x and Windows 7/8 x32/x64.

On OS X, the 64 bit JVM is supported. On Windows, support is limited to the 32 bit JVM (on x64 most people are using a 32 bit JVM).
